post:
Hello Everyone!

We are excited to give the LowEndTalk community some nice offers today. HiFormance offers high-end services for low-end prices! OpenVZ and KVM gigabit VPS with pure SSD in 5 locations. Are you an affiliate or reseller? Contact us for competitive bulk pricing or ask about our affiliate solutions! Payment methods: PayPal, AliPay, WeChat

**Why choose HiFormance?**  
24/7/365 Expert Support  
Full Control Panel (SolusVM)  
HTML5 VNC  
Instant Activation  
KVM Virtualization  
99.99% Uptime SLA  
25+ OS Templates  
Custom ISO's (Bring your own)  
FREE Location transfers  
Bulk pricing discounts  
E5-2660+ Host Nodes  
Flexible pricing & configurations  
Pure SSD RAID10 Storage  
3.x Kernel OpenVZ! (Docker Supported)  
  
  
**5 Locations: **  
Los Angeles - http://lg.losangeles.ca.hiformance.net/  
Chicago - http://lg.chicago.il.hiformance.net/  
Dallas - http://lg.dallas.tx.hiformance.net/  
Buffalo - http://lg.buffalo.ny.hiformance.net/  
Atlanta - http://lg.atlanta.ga.hiformance.net/
